report_paragraph_present: {dosh_type} has been detected. Rahu is placed in the {rahu_house} house, Ketu is in the {ketu_house} house, and {planets_between} planets are situated between them.
Kaalsarp Dosh is a unique astrological condition when all planets fall between Rahu and Ketu ЁЯРН.
This alignment may bring challenges like delays, obstacles, and mental restlessness.
Remedies like worship of Lord Shiva, chanting of Mahamrityunjaya Mantra, and observing fast on Nag Panchami can bring relief ЁЯФ▒.
Although it may sound intimidating, strong planetary yogas and a positive mindset can balance its effects. It is not a curse, but an opportunity for self-growth тЬи.
en.general_explanation_present: Kaalsarp Dosh may create hurdles in career, finance, or personal life depending on the chart.
report_paragraph_absent: {planets_outside} planets are placed outside the RahuтАУKetu axis, hence this dosh is not formed in your kundali.
Kaalsarp Dosh is a unique astrological condition when all planets fall between Rahu and Ketu ЁЯРН.
This alignment can bring delays, challenges, and mental unrest in life.
Worship of Lord Shiva, chanting of Mahamrityunjaya Mantra, and fasting on Nag Panchami are known to bring relief ЁЯФ▒.
While it may sound alarming, strong planetary yogas and a positive mindset can neutralize its impact. It is not a curse, but a chance for self-growth тЬи.
en.general_explanation_absent: Kaalsarp Dosh is a unique planetary alignment that may bring phases of emotional turbulence or uncertainty in life. However, it is not always negative тАФ it can also spark deep spiritual growth and inner awakening. The key is to understand its influence and seek proper guidance to channel its energy positively.
en.summary_block: Kaalsarp Dosh is said to occur when all planets lie between Rahu and Ketu. Depending on its type and placement, it can indicate struggles in personal or professional life. However, its effect varies based on other yogas and planetary strengths. Remedial measures can reduce its impact.
